medium: Lacquer with raised designs (takamaki-e), gold lacquer on ivory, cloisonne (metal and glass)
title: Inro_ (tiered case) with Bushclover and Butterflies; Netsuke with Autumn Grasses
description: five-case inro; gold fundame with butterflies near bush, clover beside rocky rivulet; cloisonne enamel ojime; ivory manju netsuke painted gold with flowering shrubs in hiramakie; attached with brown braided silk rope through inro, ties at bottom
creditline: Gift of Leo A. and Doris Hodroff
